TopicTitle: Ability to use planets from real space database

Articles.Content:
like it done in http://spaceengine.org

with automatically procedural generation of planets surface and atmosphere.

What about to add more planets, and even real planets and star systems?

Everyone in this game has the same solar system.

We may get additional ones, very far down the line

Short answer of what I learned here :

Real time procedural generation, even with the same seed, would require a lot of computing power. KSP isn't and will never be like Spaceengine which doesn't have to calculate a complex physics for 400parts spaceship. Plus KSP is using Unity which isn't optimized for that.

Furthermore reproducing real planet would require a lot of work, and the alternative of pseudo-random procedural generation isn't necessarily more fun since you have far more chance to generate a system of boring planet than a solar system you would want to play it for hours in Career-mode.

Hope that answer any question one might ask.
